ygData.subject: Re: The End is Near...........
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinesis walks to Twister. A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure. Sinesis said. Sinister shook

Subject: Re: The End is Near...........

Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sinesis walks to Twister.

"A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of =
one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Sini=
ster shook his head.

"Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Blender=
 look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune and t=
ake a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time hopin=
g that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always will be =
a failure...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
  Subject: R=
e: The End is Near...........


  Twister/Blizzard


  *Twister looks at wh=
at was left of the base*

  Twister: I always be nothing but a failer with =
nowhere to go...

  *Twister walks next to the pieces of the base sits down=
 staring at the ground*


  *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of he=
r optic*

  Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually c=
all home.....

  *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

    ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Satu=
rday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
    Subject: The End is Near...........


   =
 Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and w=
alked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun aro=
und and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

    "You do not=
 know when to give up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, I'm goi=
ng to grind you so small you won't be able to be seen with a microscope!" D=
racona said. She kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It missed=
 Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plint=
issa tackled Dacona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to her saw=
 blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodg=
ed. Dracona started to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa still avo=
ids it. Plintissa was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now, after=
 her bad life that she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa beat D=
racona mercilessly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plintissa spu=
n a simple stick through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and sliced t=
he stick to pieces. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hundred ti=
mes. Plintissa fell.

    "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can sur=
vive. As ancient as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm=
 sorry Plintissa, you were a good friend, but don't take this personally, i=
t's just business." Dracona said.
     
    Dracona pulled back the saw bla=
de and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier =
and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, bu=
t as she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew =
up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first ari=
ved on the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces e=
verywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

    "*Cough, Cough=
* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona di=
ed smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she would n=
ever leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and =
she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was =
crying, too.

    "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whi=
spered.

    "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray m=
e?" Artist asked.

    "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, w=
e can't part, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the =
extinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

=
    "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my=
 friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

    "Your helpi=
ng days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

   =
 "This isn't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?=
"

    "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team =
Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed=
 by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. =
And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks=
 at the base and sighs.

    "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to =
leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

    "Bli=
zzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

    Artist=
 came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and floated in=
to Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He opened his ches=
t compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plintissa's spark=
 with his own, they became one.

    "Till all are one." Artist whispered r=
eally low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Pl=
intissa was with him now, and now they could never be seperated again. Arti=
st, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran=
 out into a field.

    "Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spar=
k." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist h=
eaded toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she =
could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can always be helpful.=
 Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still inside.

    "I love y=
ou." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

    "I love you too." Plintissa said=
 to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
